called: Tree - Based Convolutional Neural Network ( TBCNN )

called.from sentence: In this paper , we propose a novel neural architecture for discriminative sentence modeling , called the Tree - Based Convolutional Neural Network ( TBCNN ) .

leverage.from sentence: Our models can leverage different sentence parsing trees , e.g. , constituency trees and dependency trees .

variants.from sentence: The model variants are denoted as c- TBCNN and d - TBCNN , respectively .

tree - based convolution.from sentence: The idea of tree - based convolution is to apply a set of subtree feature detectors , sliding over the entire parsing tree of a sentence ; then pooling aggregates these extracted feature vectors by taking the maximum value in each dimension .
